title: Bomani Jones on NBA Activism, Kevin Durant’s Legacy, and More | Real Ones
description:
ESPN’s Bomani Jones joins Logan and Raja this Thursday to talk about the NBA’s COVID response, the national anthem fiasco of late, what the NBA can do moving forward to support players, and whether players need to take more responsibility (0:45). Then they get into the on-court chemistry of the Brooklyn Nets (3:00) and Kevin Durant’s legacy (44:00) before anointing their Real Ones of the Week (56:45).
Hosts: Logan Murdock and Raja Bell
Guest: Bomani Jones
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
